content: UPDATE-4 (1 August): Coinstrat Bounty Wallet SWAP - ERC20 to BEP20. Please Update POA with BEP20 wallet and then fill this form- https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOgCkOYDC4IcHlQ03yAkQDMWdo061SwhdFYsTubqyc_1SCYw/viewformCheck its done- https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WZ3PydPx1EdursoFoaUEFt-Pud035Aq7xdOyY0xfmOw/Any Questions? Ask on Telegram - https://t.me/qqwx_bounty    WEBSITE   TWITTER  FACEBOOK TELEGRAM  CHANNEL YOUTUBE   Coinstrat is a rising platform in digital asset financial service, providing retail investors with trading, custody, interest earning account, crypto-backed loan, dual investment and security solution. In 2022, Coinstrat is one of the first crypto platforms in the world to provide high yield structured products such as Dual Investment with high APY up to 300%. Importantly, Coinstrat strictly follows 100% reserved of customer funds. Bounty Related All questions: Group Here Channel HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Friday/Saturday Forum time); Otherwise you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsDear Bounty Hunters, We delightfully announcing the Coinstrat bounty program has been launched. The Bounty will run the following week. Work properly and submit on time. Week 1 (11 Dec - 17 Dec)..........ENDWeek 2 (18 Dec - 24 Dec)..........ENDWeek 3 (25 Dec - 31 Dec)..........ENDWeek 4 (01 Jan - 07 Jan)..........ENDMandatory Rules■Must join our Telegram group; & Telegram Channel;■Must join  Bounty telegram group  &  Chanel;■Must follow us on Twitter;■Must follow us on Facebook;■Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;■Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;■Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;■We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;■The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,■Each Week will end Saturday at 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form■Post a reply before join campaign■Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostBitcointalk username: Telegram username: Which Campaign you joined: ERC-20 wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Facebook Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Youtube Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Tiktok Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Telegam Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Rules of Twitter Campaign:■Follow our official Twitter page;■Minimum 100 followers need to join this campaign;■Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;■Make 2 posts every week with #Coinstrat #ERC20 #ETH;■Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;■Your Twitter account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Facebook Campaign:■Follow our official Facebook ;■Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;■Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;■Must Share/likes/Comment 5 posts every week from our official page;■Make 2 posts every week with #Coinstrat #ERC20 #ETH;■Your Facebook account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Youtube:■Subscriber Coinstrat Official Youtube Channel  ■Minimum 100 Subscribers need to join our campaign■Subscriber must be public;■Video minimum length 2 minutes;■You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;■Your title must include the word Coinstrat. And Use hashtag #Coinstrat #XP #ERC20 #ETH;■Video quality will be good;■You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;■In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Facebook Link and also Telegram link;■Maximum 4 video will accept for one person;■You will add your Bitcointalk username, Coinstrat username & ERC-20 address in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 500-5000 (Extra 1 stakes)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)Rules of Tiktok:■Minimum 100 Followers/Subscribers need to join our campaign■Video minimum length 20 Seconds;■You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;■Your title must include the word Coinstrat and Use hashtag #Coinstrat #ERC20 #ETH;■Video quality will be good;■In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Facebook Link, also Telegram link;■Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;■You will add your Bitcointalk username, ERC-20 address in Video DescriptionTiktok Video Rewards#Rewards Depend on Quality and how unique this is.Rules of Article:■Content Must be original;■Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;■The article must be up to 500 words;■We don’t allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ■Content must be in English■Maximum 4 content will accept for one person;■Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Facebook Link, also Telegram link;■You will add your Bitcointalk username, ERC-20 address in Video DescriptionContent Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesRules of Telegram Campaign:■Must join our Telegram group & Telegram Channel If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;■Add our AVATAR and name ( "Your Name | Coinstrat Ambassador" ) - Mandatory;■Positive message in Coinstrat Group 2 times every week;■Post minimum 5 positive messages about Coinstrat to other Crypto Telegram groups;■Do not spam into the telegram group;■Do not use slag language in the telegram group;■Submit your message link End of the week (Friday/SaturdayForum time)Telegram Rewards#2 Stakes every week  SPREADSHEET / Participants List[N.B- Token distribution will be done by the team and Distribution will be done. I am the only bounty manager of this project. I am not responsible for the bad things about this project. I have the right to change any rules of this project.]

comments.body: UPDATE-1 : Use ERC-20 wallet address (Do not use BSC wallet). Who used BSC/Bep20 address please Knock me for Update. Telegram - https://t.me/qqwx_bounty UPDATE-2 : All campaign rules Changed. Please again sign up and use the old POA  link, Do not need new POA. Telegram - https://t.me/qqwx_bounty UPDATE-3 (16 Dec): Check your Name on  SPREADSHEET  If you not in the list, please fill up form. Without filling up form you will get 0 stakes.UPDATE-4 (1 August): Coinstrat Bounty Wallet SWAP - ERC20 to BEP20. Please Update POA with BEP20 wallet and then fill this form- https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOgCkOYDC4IcHlQ03yAkQDMWdo061SwhdFYsTubqyc_1SCYw/viewformCheck its done- https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WZ3PydPx1EdursoFoaUEFt-Pud035Aq7xdOyY0xfmOw/Any Questions? Ask on Telegram - https://t.me/qqwx_bounty
